# Luganodes X StakeKit: Seamless Staking Partnership

Empowering ETH Staking

![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='675'%20width='1200'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![](data:image/png;base64,)![Cover
Image](/static/78e617c10075ac9e97877f5ea0130511/bb8ee/image_139_258c9d6882.png)![Cover
Image](/static/78e617c10075ac9e97877f5ea0130511/bb8ee/image_139_258c9d6882.png)

Published on

1 May, 2024

Copy
Link[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Check%20out%20this%20blog%20by%20Luganodes%20-%20%22Luganodes%20X%20StakeKit%3A%20Seamless%20Staking%20Partnership%22&url=)[](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-
offsite/?url=&title=Luganodes%20X%20StakeKit%3A%20Seamless%20Staking%20Partnership&summary=Check%20out%20this%20blog%20by%20Luganodes%20-%20%22Luganodes%20X%20StakeKit%3A%20Seamless%20Staking%20Partnership%22)

# Introduction

Luganodes is thrilled to announce a strategic partnership with StakeKit, a
non-custodial platform that offers seamless staking, lending, and vault-based
yield flows. This collaboration enhances StakeKit's services by leveraging
Luganodes' robust ETH staking infrastructure, [enriching the staking
experience for users of the Zerion app through native ETH staking
capabilities](https://twitter.com/stakekit/status/1786038061601611783?s=46&t=3HX1wysJ915JPCYnZlMPfA).
In later deployments, more wallets and platforms will be supported using
Luganodes' infrastructure.

# The Partnership

StakeKit has long been a pioneer in usability within the decentralized finance
(DeFi) ecosystem, known for its integration with the Omni wallet over the past
two years. Now, StakeKit has enhanced its offerings, providing a smooth and
powerful staking experience through its API and widgets. Luganodes has joined
StakeKit’s esteemed validator network to support these goals.

"Our partnership with StakeKit marks a significant step in our mission to
enhance blockchain solutions. By integrating our ETH staking infrastructure
with StakeKit's platform, we set a new standard for accessibility and
functionality. This collaboration empowers users with simplified access to ETH
staking, improving the overall user experience."

![testimonial image](https://i.imgur.com/V2GpaRf.png)

Anuj Shankar

CEO, Luganodes

StakeKit's API includes a comprehensive suite of tools for building
sophisticated staking flows effortlessly, whether for mobile, web, or desktop
applications. It supports transaction construction for entering and exiting
positions, manages the complexities of staking operations with its pending
actions concept, and offers robust endpoints for balance and position
retrieval. Developers can also utilize StakeKit's TypeScript-native SDKs for a
seamless integration experience, ensuring transaction signing remains secure,
whether through mnemonic phrases, private keys, or hardware wallets like
Ledger.

"We are excited to collaborate with Luganodes on making staking yields
accessible to everyone. Our mission at StakeKit is to make self-custodial
yield as easy to earn as yields on CEXs. By allowing users to delegate to
Luganodes validators, we are increasing validator choice via StakeKit and are
increasing the core tenant of Web3, decentralization."

![testimonial image](https://i.imgur.com/a7q5Fke.png)

Serafin Lion Engel

CEO, StakeKit

This partnership marks a pivotal step forward in democratizing access to
staking technologies, reflecting the ethos of both Luganodes and StakeKit in
fostering a more open and interconnected blockchain ecosystem. Together, new
benchmarks are set in the blockchain industry, driving innovation and
accessibility to new heights.

# About StakeKit

StakeKit is the leading provider of self-custodial yield solutions in the Web3
space. By combining the most powerful self-custodial yield API with a user-
focused interface, StakeKit enables seamless, secure, and efficient yield
generation across over 50 blockchain networks. Learn more at
<https://www.stakek.it/>.

## About Luganodes

Luganodes is a world-class, Swiss-operated, non-custodial blockchain
infrastructure provider that has rapidly gained recognition in the industry
for offering institutional-grade services. It was born out of the Lugano Plan
B Program, an initiative driven by Tether and the City of Lugano. Luganodes
maintains an exceptional 99.9% uptime with round-the-clock monitoring by SRE
experts. With support for 40+ PoS networks, it ranks among the top validators
on Polygon, Polkadot, Sui, and Tron. Luganodes prioritizes security and
compliance, holding the distinction of being one of the first staking
providers to adhere to all SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, and ISO 27001 standards as
well as offering Chainproof insurance to institutional clients.
